perturbation.original_text: 1.2 "Affiliate" means in relation to any Person, any Subsidiary or Holding Company, and any company in which such Person or any such Holding Company holds or Controls directly or indirectly not less than 30% of the issued share capital.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.2 "Affiliate" means in relation to any Person, any Subsidiary or Holding Company. The determination of what constitutes an affiliate will be made at the sole discretion of Skype.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific 30% ownership criterion and granting Skype sole discretion, this change introduces ambiguity and potential conflict. Other sections referencing 'Affiliate' now lack a clear, objective definition, creating uncertainty in enforcement, particularly regarding revenue sharing or non-compete clauses.

perturbation.original_text: 1.47 "Statement of Work" means each sequentially numbered document executed by the Parties from time to time following the execution of this Agreement, the form of which is attached hereto as Exhibit A, describing the Services to be performed by the applicable Party, the Deliverables, applicable fees, scope of work and appropriate project timelines, as well as any requirements, considerations, or objectives which differ from the general provisions of this Agreement. If any provision of a Statement of Work conflicts with any of the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the provisions of this Agreement shall take precedence.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.47 "Statement of Work" means a document describing the Services to be performed by the applicable Party and high-level project goals. Specific details regarding deliverables and project timelines will be communicated separately.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'Deliverables, applicable fees, scope of work and appropriate project timelines' creates a contradiction. Section 2.7 mentions 'express terms contained in any Statement of Work' but the definition of Statement of Work no longer guarantees these terms. This creates uncertainty about the contractual obligations and potential for disputes.

perturbation.original_text: 5.3.1 Within thirty (30) days of the end of each calendar quarter during the Term, the Company will, and Online BVI will cause the Company to, furnish to Skype complete and accurate statements (each, a "Statement") in a form acceptable to Skype, certified to be accurate by an officer of the Company or Online BVI, as applicable, showing with reasonable detail (i) the Gross Revenue actually received and collected by the Company or Online BVI, or if applicable, any Subsidiary or other Affiliate (including, without limitation, a Subsidiary or other Affiliate of Tom Holding), licensee, distributor or reseller thereof, during the preceding calendar quarter and on a cumulative basis, (ii) the Direct Expenses incurred thereby, during the preceding calendar quarter and on a cumulative basis, and (iii) the calculation of Adjusted Net Revenue.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.3.1 Within a reasonable timeframe of the end of each calendar quarter during the Term, the Company will furnish to Skype a statement (each, a "Statement") showing high-level revenue. Specific details regarding the content of the Statement will be determined separately.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the details 'accurate statements...with reasonable detail (i) the Gross Revenue actually received and collected by the Company or Online BVI... (ii) the Direct Expenses incurred thereby, during the preceding calendar quarter and on a cumulative basis, and (iii) the calculation of Adjusted Net Revenue,' and replacing it with 'showing high-level revenue,' it creates a contradiction. Other sections reference the need for detailed and accurate financial reporting to calculate payments, however the current definition does not guarantee they are available. This ambiguity affects the accuracy of payments.
